message.body: ï¿¼Self love
Real nice! Good luck!
20 bucks!!!
It's a steal!
I'm so Jewish!!!
Sorry was in a kinda fight with my lady friend yesterday. I hope the sho went well.
Oh it's tomorrow. I hope all is well now!!!!!
All is ok but it was kinda a wake up that things were not ok
Do u wanna talk about in good at these things
D
Whoops lots of typos!
Let me try again. Do you want to talk about it? I'm good at these things!

I don't really want to talk about it because I'm kinda whipped out from talking about it but basically I love her but I might not be the best person for her cuz I'm broke and she's broke and has a kid and is in school and needs someone to support her more finically and with time.
Oh I'm sorry Nate! U r a great a guy. She probably feels so lucky she gets to be with you. It sounds very complicated. If u need a friend u can always call or text me.
Thanks you are a loving buddy. We love each other a lot but still may be bad for one another. She just needs more than I can give, she's had a really tough life. I don't want to make it tougher.
Nate you sound sad. I can't imagine you making anyone's life harder. You will figure it out. She will figure it out. We are lucky we live in world with so much love.
Well she lived a tougher life than me and needs more help than me
You are great! Even after all this time you still help me feel better
Wether you figure it out together or not you can always know you wil be there for each other.
Well I can relate to that situation.
In particular.
And it's hard to fall in love and decide its not best
It's still hard.

I still always want to believe that love can make relationships work. But I have to just accept that love doesn't always translate into a traditional shared life. Then I feel happy and excited about falling in love again. And finding love in other places.
But don't be down on yourself Nate. You have a lot to offer. Maybe you guys can figure it out.
But we aren't breaking up or anything we just realized how we couldn't support one another.
I am really bad about confronting people in a relationship because I never want to hurt them epically when they are already sad
People are strong.
She has a lot of problems
I can't fix
Do you feel bad that you can't fix it?
Yes because she has no one to fall back on
No family
I wish hugs could solve problem
I gave a lot of Hugs and they helped
But just temporarily
I guess the question comes to which would you
Whoops screwed up again. Im a bad texter.
The question is : are there sacrifices you can make to mitigate the situation?
I could give up making art and care for someone else's kid, that would help but mostly she needs finical support that I will never be able to supply
If we stay together it won't really help her any but if we break up she will be destroyed. I love her and don't want to do that to her
Oh man. What do you want to do? Sorry I had to Bike to town to run some errands for tomorrow.
I like thinking hypotheticals ! What if the best case scenarios ever happen!!
I don't know. Hang in there and see if things change
That's a good way to think
